rows.label: qev056503_MSG0001
rows.name: Help! They've gone berserk! They're wrecking the plant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev056503_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Rosie to explain the situation.

rows.label: qev056503_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev056503_SEL0021
rows.name: Make sure that Rosie is all right.

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0002
rows.name: The autosentries went bananas and started firing at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0003
rows.name:
I tried to shut 'em down by manual override,
but it didn't work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0004
rows.name:
And now the plant's main turbine is going into a full
thermal meltdown![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm sure we can thank the sentries' decision to spray
the place down with bullets for that, but regardless,
I can't stop it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0006
rows.name:
This is more than I can handle alone.
I'm evacuating the plant, but I need backup.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0007
rows.name:
Thanks, but I'm fine save for a couple scrapes.
Oh, and I probably need a new pair of pants...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0008
rows.name:
But yeah, the autosentries went bananas and started
firing at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0009
rows.name:
I tried to shut 'em down by manual override,
but it didn't work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0010
rows.name:
And now the plant's main turbine is going into a full
thermal meltdown![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'm sure we can thank the sentries' decision to spray
the place down with bullets for that, but regardless,
I can't stop it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0012
rows.name:
This is more than I can handle alone.
I'm evacuating the plant, but I need backup.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0013
rows.name:
It shouldn't be possible for my machines to attack
humans or damage the plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0014
rows.name:
They were programmed to self-destruct in the event of
any attempt to harm a friendly target.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0015
rows.name: This cannot have been a simple accident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0016
rows.name: Meaning...what? Someone did this on purpose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0017
rows.name:
I can't say for certain without conducting an
investigation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0018
rows.name:
The one thing that is clear is that this constitutes a
serious threat to us Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0019
rows.name:
If the Biahno water-purification plant is destroyed,
we will be unable to create any more senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0020
rows.name:
Right. There's no telling how bad the damage will be if
we don't do something now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0021
rows.name:
Submitting a formal request to BLADE would take
too long. Can I depend on you to take care of this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev056503_SEL0031
rows.name: Give a firm nod in reply.

rows.label: qev056503_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev056503_SEL0041
rows.name: Shrug and shake your head no.

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0022
rows.name: Perfect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0023
rows.name:
Look, someone's got to do it, and Tan'celeg and I
can't fightâ€”so that just leaves you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0024
rows.name:
You must destroy the autosentries completely.
If we cannot perform an emergency shutdown,
that is the only remaining way to stop them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0025
rows.name:
There's a power switch in the control room for the plant
turbine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0026
rows.name:
Cut the power, and it should cool off pretty quickly.
I'm afraid that'll have to be your job, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0027
rows.name:
I promise I will uncover the cause of this.
For now, please focus on containing the situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0028
rows.name: Good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0029
rows.name:
You need to hit that turbine switch to stop the thermal
meltdown. On top of that, you also need to destroy the
berserk autosentries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0030
rows.name: Thank you! The plant's still standing because of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0031
rows.name:
An autopsy on the destroyed autosentries revealed
the cause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0032
rows.name: It seems this was the work of...a traitor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0033
rows.name:
Traitor? Whoa, hold the phone!
Are you saying that one of my people is a spy?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0034
rows.name:
This is not a human traitor.
He is one of ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0035
rows.name:
But don't the Orphe basically share one consciousness
through the Ovah or whatevs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0036
rows.name: As they say, to every rule there is an exception.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0037
rows.name:
This traitor's name is Lan'cord. He is one of the
original Orpheans brought to Mira by the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0038
rows.name:
Based on the memories I inherited from Sun'celeg,
Lan'cord's Ovah was quite faint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0039
rows.name:
Five of the six of us decided it was advantageous to
side with humanity, but Lan'cord elected to remain
with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0040
rows.name: Yeah, but why the heck would he target the plant?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0041
rows.name:
Because of the autosentries, I assume.
It was simply an opportunity for mischief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0042
rows.name:
Lan'cord would have been intimately familiar with the
technology used in its design.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0043
rows.name:
It would have been far simpler for him to hack than a
human or Ma-non creation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0044
rows.name:
Though we were resigned to him leaking our technology
to the Ganglion, we did not anticipate him attacking us
directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0045
rows.name: This guy sounds like a real pain in the ass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0046
rows.name:
Well, whatever happens, I'm staying here and doing
this job. And Lan-whoever can go suck eggs if he
doesn't like it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0047
rows.name:
I won't give this place up.
I owe that to my friends who lost their lives here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0048
rows.name:
So, uh, I guess you should get busy coming up with a
new autosentry that your little friend can't hack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0049
rows.name: ...You are not angered by my failing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0050
rows.name:
You guys are doing your best to help us humans out.
How could I be angry? I'm grateful. Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev056503_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you look forward to an even better autosentry.

rows.label: qev056503_JNK0060
rows.name: Pledge

rows.label: qev056503_SEL0061
rows.name: Swear to stop Lan'cord if you find him.

rows.label: qev056503_JNK0070
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev056503_SEL0071
rows.name: Say that Tan'celeg should have warned you earlier.

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0051
rows.name:
And I promise that you will have it soon.
I thank you for your understanding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0052
rows.name: Good luck with its development.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0053
rows.name:
And thank you, too.
I owe the both of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0055
rows.name: It would be nice to stop the problem at its source.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0056
rows.name:
Give him one in the teeth for me if you see him.
Or, uh...the mandible, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0057
rows.name: And another for me, if you will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0058
rows.name:
That guy's going to have one messed-up smile after
you're done with him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0059
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I have my own mess here to deal with
getting the plant put back together.
Thanks again for everything, you two.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0060
rows.name:
I am sorry. It is difficult for us to predict that which
does not involve the will of the Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0061
rows.name:
But I promise I will build a better autosentryâ€”
one which is impervious to Lan'cord's attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0062
rows.name: I'm counting on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0063
rows.name:
And thank you, too. 
I owe the both of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056503_MSG0064
rows.name: Thanks again for your continuous help and support.[ST:wait ]
